name: Unscented Oatmilk
description:
A Beautiful Creamy White Unscented and Uncolored Soap.  This is made with Oat Milk for gentle cleansing and has a wonderful rich creamy lather. Good for those with sensitivities to scent and color. 

These are Fat, Thick, Chunky bars often weighing  127g (4.5oz). 

Sodium (Olive) Olivate, Sodium (Sustainable Palm) Palmate, Sodium (Coconut) Cocoate, Sodium Shea Butterate, Oat Milk/Avoine Lait, Sodium (Castor) Castorate

name: G'Oatmeal
description:
Unscented and Uncolored for the most sensitive skin types. Goats Milk with added Oatmeal for skin soothing properties. Can also be used as a wonderful  exfoliant. Rub on washcloth and use if you find you do not want the exfoliation. 

These are Fat, Thick, Chunky bars often weighing between 127gr-141grs (4.5-5oz). 

Sodium (Olive) Olivate, Sodium (Sustainable Palm) Palmate, Sodium (Coconut) Cocoate, Goat Milk/lait de Ch√®vre, Sodium Shea Butterate, Sodium (Castor) Castorate, Oatmeal Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Meal
